hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOOX.EOOX_ID, EOOX.CREATOR, EOOX.CREATE_TIME, EOOX.MODIFIER, EOOX.MODIFY_TIME, EOOX.REC_VER, EOOX.REC_STATUS, EOOX.ORG_ID, EOOX.EOOX_ORDER_NO, EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_CODE AS EOOX_MODULE_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_NAME AS EOOX_MODULE_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_TYPE_CODE AS EOOX_MODULE_TYPE_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_TYPE_NAME AS EOOX_MODULE_TYPE_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_TAB_SEQUENCE AS EOOX_TAB_SEQUENCE, EOEF.EOEF_TAB_CODE AS EOOX_TAB_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_TAB_NAME AS EOOX_TAB_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_TAB_NAME_EN AS EOOX_TAB_NAME_EN, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_ROW AS EOOX_FIELD_ROW, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_COLUMN AS EOOX_FIELD_COLUMN, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_CODE AS EOOX_FIELD_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_NAME AS EOOX_FIELD_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_NAME_EN AS EOOX_FIELD_NAME_EN, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_TYPE_CODE AS EOOX_FIELD_TYPE_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_TYPE_NAME AS EOOX_FIELD_TYPE_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_PARAMETER AS EOOX_FIELD_PARAMETER, NVL(EOOX.EOOX_ACCESS_CODE,EOEF.EOEF_ACCESS_CODE) AS EOOX_ACCESS_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_REQUIRE AS EOOX_REQUIRE, EOEF.EOEF_MODIFIED AS EOOX_MODIFIED, NVL(EOOX.EOOX_VALUE_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_DEFAULT_VALUE) AS EOOX_VALUE_CODE, EOOX.EOOX_VALUE_NAME FROM EO_EXTENSION_FIELD EOEF LEFT JOIN EO_ORDER_EXTENSION EOOX ON EOOX.ORG_ID = EOEF.ORG_ID AND EOOX.EOOX_MODULE_CODE = EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_CODE AND EOOX.EOOX_MODULE_TYPE_CODE =EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_TYPE_CODE AND EOOX.EOOX_TAB_CODE = EOEF.EOEF_TAB_CODE AND EOOX.EOOX_FIELD_CODE = EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_CODE <<AND EOOX.EOOX_ORDER_NO LIKE :eooxOrderNo>> WHERE EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_CODE = 'EO_ORDER_EXTENSION' <<AND EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eoefModuleTypeCode>> <<AND EOEF.ORG_ID =:orgId>>
